title: Formatting JavaDoc extra spaces
body:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Formatting JavaDoc extra spaces

before:

```java
public interface Projection {
    
    /**
     * Get column name.
     * 
     * @return column name
     */
    String getColumnName();
}
```

after:

```java
public interface Projection {
    
    /**
     * Get column name.
     *
     * @return column name
     */
    String getColumnName();
}
```

---

title: Bump Junit Platform to 5.10.3 to support using `@EnabledInNativeImage` on the test classes
body:
For #29052.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - For #30031 . Bump Junit Platform to 5.10.3 to support using `@EnabledInNativeImage` on the test classes. Refer to https://github.com/junit-team/junit5/issues/3745 .
  - Bump `org.graalvm.polyglot:polyglot` to 24.0.1. This is mainly to further reduce the total execution time of the unit tests of `org.apache.shardingsphere:shardingsphere-infra-expr-espresso`.
  - After updating testcontainers-java 1.19.8, its dependency `com.github.docker-java:docker-java-api:3.3.6` began to require additional GraalVM Reachability Metadata. Refer to https://github.com/oracle/graalvm-reachability-metadata/issues/492 .
  - Removes hardcoding of port `39567` in Seata's unit tests.
  - Updates testcontainers-java to avoid frequent docker pull behavior in a short period of time. Refer to https://github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-java/pull/8453 .
 
```
# https://github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-java/issues/8454
TC logs roughly 14 mb of logs during the 2 minutes of pulling and thousands of requests.
```

---

Before committing this PR, I'm sure that I have checked the following options:
- [x] My code follows the [code of conduct](https://shardingsphere.apache.org/community/en/involved/conduct/code/) of this project.
- [x] I have self-reviewed the commit code.
- [x] I have (or in comment I request) added corresponding labels for the pull request.
- [x] I have passed maven check locally : `./mvnw clean install -B -T1C -Dmaven.javadoc.skip -Dmaven.jacoco.skip -e`.
- [x] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.
- [x] I have added corresponding unit tests for my changes.

title: Add documentation for using XA distributed transactions in GraalVM Native Image
body:
For #29052.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Add documentation for using XA distributed transactions in GraalVM Native Image. Refer to https://www.graalvm.org/docs/reference-manual/native-image/assets/reflect-config-schema-v1.0.0.json .
  - For https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/actions/runs/9782731559/job/27009752037 . Fixes nativeTest failure under GraalVM Native Image due to class information changes.
  - For https://github.com/oracle/graal/issues/8723 . Removes invalid reference to `libz-dev` from documentation.
  - For #31573 and #31526 . Fixes the issue that the HiveServer2 JDBC Driver could not be connected through the HikariCP connection pool.

---
